title: Unchosen Ruler: The O'Malley Family
description: He’s the future unchosen ruler of the O’Malleys.Locked away for too many years.Underestimated and pissed off.Protective beyond all rationale.Possessive unlike any man I’ve ever known.I should run. Except Liam O'Malley isn't a choice. He's the air I breathe.Still, I wonder if I can really be queen of the O’Malleys—especially when I discover the truth about who I am.Anyone else in our shoes would make a different choice, but nothing with Liam is predictable.In our world, anything but strength gets you killed.It’s what makes him the perfect unchosen ruler.”Unchosen Ruler” is the sixth jaw-dropping installment of the “Mafia Wars” series. It begins the O’Malley crime family reign and is a forbidden Dark Mafia romance, interconnecting stand-alone, and guaranteed to have an HEA.
author: Maggie Cole
